actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the effect on our society of the level of violence depicted on television requires more consideration and study.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that: (1) those persons responsible for television programming and broadcasting should consider the relationship between the level of violence depicted on television and a distorted view of social reality held by heavy viewers of television; and (2) further investigation of the correlation between the level of violence depicted on television and aggressive, including violent, behavior in children and adults should be pursued.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the effect on our society of the level of violence depicted on television requires more consideration and study.
